--- Firedrill ---

Firedrill nods and sits down, thinking about the adventure he was 
going on.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Melchana had an evil looking grin pass on her face.
> 
> Melchana: So, you do have a short memory... You're the Autobot 
> Ambassador. You'll be living as a Tripredacus for some times just 
like 
> Gesper is living as an Autobot. For now, we're going to Australia. 
> That's where we established the Shadow Destiny.
> 
> She started the engines and flew off.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "-rAuq-" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > ooC: I'll cover Firedrill for a bit, but not for long, just long 
> > enough to bring him out of the picture. =)
> > 
> > -- Firedrill --
> > 
> > Firedrill nods, and steps onto the ship, "Sorry, Melchana, just 
> > thinking..." He pauses, shakes his head, and continues, "So, 
where 
> > were we headed again?"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > OOC: Hey, who has control of Firedrill since Jer left?
> > > 
> > > BIC: Melchana was getting more and more impatient...
> > > 
> > > Melchana: What is this idiot waiting for to get aboard?
